document_data.name: Protection From Mechanical Traps
document_data.mainbody: '''''Protection from mechanical traps''''' was a [[spell]] used by the [[Red Wizards of Thay]].
document_data.Effects: When cast, this spell protected the caster from non-magical mechanical [[trap]]s. The spell was unable to detect the presence of a mechanical trap.
document_data.Casting: In addition to [[verbal]] and [[somatic]] components, the spell required a [[material component]], a small amount of axle grease.
